name: dfor2

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
-| wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wo(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
-| wi(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wo(w0, w1))

|- wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
-| wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w1), wo(w0, w1))

comment: Logical 'or' expressed in terms of implication only. Theorem *5.25 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 124. (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 20-Oct-2012.)
